Name

Class Napi::Name inherits from class Napi::Value.

Names are JavaScript values that can be used as a property name. There are two specialized types of names supported in Node.js Addon API Napi::String and Napi::Symbol.

Methods

Constructor

Napi::Name::Name();

Returns an empty Napi::Name.

Napi::Name::Name(napi_env env, napi_value value);
  • [in] env - The environment in which to create the array.
  • [in] value - The primitive to wrap.

Returns a Napi::Name created from the JavaScript primitive.

Note: The value is not coerced to a string.
